summary: This is an email chain from June 2023 discussing coordination between law enforcement/prosecutors regarding an investigation into Leon Black. It references a minor victim interview conducted by the District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) and communication with attorney Jeanne Christensen.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The subject of a human trafficking (HT) referral and investigation, with coordination occurring between agencies regarding a minor victim.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: Counsel who was communicated with regarding the Leon Black investigation and the deconfliction with DANY.

connections.description: Jeanne Christensen is identified as counsel in the context of the investigation into Leon Black.

events.title: Investigation Update Communication
events.description: An email was sent providing an update on the Leon Black human trafficking subject referral, including notes from conversations with counsel and initial referral details.

events.title: DANY Victim Interview Read-out
events.description: A follow-up email states the sender spoke with the District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) and received a read-out of their interviews of the minor victim.

keyFacts: Leon Black was the subject of a human trafficking (HT) referral and investigation as of June 2023.
The District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) conducted interviews of a minor victim in the case.
There was active coordination and deconfliction between federal/state authorities and attorney Jeanne Christensen regarding the investigation.
